scripts.mega:react-latest-cra-latest-ts: npm run create:react-latest-cra-latest-ts && npm run copy:react-latest-cra-latest-ts && npm run install:react-latest-cra-latest-ts && npm run build:react-latest-cra-latest-ts
scripts.mega:react-latest-next-latest-ts: npm run create:react-latest-next-latest-ts && npm run copy:react-latest-next-latest-ts && npm run install:react-latest-next-latest-ts && npm run build:react-latest-next-latest-ts

config.REACT_LATEST_CRA_LATEST_TS: --build-tool cra --build-tool-version latest --language ts --name react-latest-cra-latest-ts --framework react --framework-version latest
config.REACT_LATEST_NEXT_LATEST_TS: --build-tool next --build-tool-version latest --language ts --name react-latest-next-latest-node-18-ts --framework react --framework-version latest
